name: Steel Wars Royale
description:
Battle players from all around the world in this free, real time multiplayer strategy game full of action!

Discover, collect and upgrade 44+ cards with different mechs, robots and powerful weapons!

Define your strategy and choose the units you will use in combat. Your decision will make the difference between victory and defeat in this robot brawl! Destroy your enemies in the leader board and assert dominance.

Game Features:

- Real time strategy: no more boring turn by turn battles, jump into the action and enjoy each battle
- 44+ different cards: fearsome mechs, war robots, weapons and turrets
- Upgrade your troops to make them more effective in battle
- Clash against your opponents and climb to the top of the rankings with your strategy
- Player vs Player online combat. PvP 1v1
- Play in 8 fun arenas: each with its unique layout

Are your ready for the war? Choose your cards wisely, adapt your army to each situation and lead your troops to the victory in this online multiplayer war strategy game.

Get your war robots ready and start the action! Play now for free this multiplayer card game! And may the best commander win the battle! Play it with your friends, destroy them and show off who is the boss.
